title: Can't create friend folders
body:
In my main account i don't have the option to create a new folder, but when i go to my other account i can, is this a bug? (prtscrn below)


main - https://prnt.sc/qak5jc
smurf - https://prnt.sc/qak6of


edit (29-12-2019): still not fixed.

replies.body: I think I found it. Up on the same row as Social there are 3 icons. Click the middle one that looks like a list. UNSELECT the box for "Group Games and Severs". The New Folder icon should appear.

> [{quoted}](name=The3cho,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=oGNPez7d,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2019-12-28T05:57:32.452+0000)
>
> I think I found it. Up on the same row as Social there are 3 icons. Click the middle one that looks like a list. UNSELECT the box for "Group Games and Severs". The New Folder icon should appear.

for me there isnt' such tab as group games and servers ?
YOU ARE THE BEST!!!!!! TY TY TY! Not even Riot employees could answer this for me!!!!
Ok, I see the options, but I can't change them.
I have the same issue, who downvotes this thread. Morons!{{champion:34}}

Just encountered this and the fix of unchecking "groups games and servers" worked.

Now my only set back is I cant move offline friends into the folder.

This worked for me. 
I didnt realize that it literally says that it disables folders.

If anyone is still having this issue:

The social tab (its under your IGN)
Select the second option (looks like a list)
Uncheck the box that says "groups games and servers"
Now the icon for creating a folder is there again. 
{{champion:41}}

> [{quoted}](name=Baylithe,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=oGNPez7d,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2020-01-14T22:37:34.363+0000)
>
> If anyone is still having this issue:
> 
> The social tab (its under your IGN)
> Select the second option (looks like a list)
> Uncheck the box that says "groups games and servers"
> Now the icon for creating a folder is there again. 
> {{champion:41}}

Thank you!

Just encountered this and the fix of unchecking "groups games and servers" worked.

Now my only set back is I cant move offline friends into the folder.

> [{quoted}](name=Vanìty,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=oGNPez7d,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2020-01-17T22:22:38.154+0000)
>
> Just encountered this and the fix of unchecking "groups games and servers" worked.
> 
> Now my only set back is I cant move offline friends into the folder.

It worked for me too. Thanks for the fix.
08/01/2020, still not fixed
Same, send tickets to the support twice now and didn't get any response (not surprising tho). Hope it gets fixed with more replies and attention to the issue :c
Same for me, rly want to sort my friendlist. Btw i have  12 +1 General +1 League + 1 offline = 15 do u guys have more folders?
I have the same problem
same problem
Same problem :(
has this been fixed for any of you guys ? Because I got the same problem {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{sticker:cass-cry}}
Same problem for me. I can't create new folders...

same problem cant make any new folders
so at the end it is just a bug?
not me just being really dumb?
I have the same Problem as well, as well as I even can't sort my offline friends in the folders ;w;
Same issues here :(
Me too... can't create new folders : /
Same problem. Maybe they'll fix it soon.            {{champion:117}}
It is really getting on my nerves that the new player are getting way more stuff like free runepages and folder creation only on new accounts aswell as free champions
